mapper.select: SELECT p.purchase_id, member_id, address, order_name, total_price, product_id, quantity FROM purchase p LEFT OUTER JOIN purchase_product pp ON p.purchase_id = pp.purchase_id ORDER BY p.purchase_id

SELECT p.purchase_id, member_id, address, order_name, total_price, product_id, quantity FROM purchase p LEFT OUTER JOIN purchase_product pp ON p.purchase_id = pp.purchase_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.purchase_id

SELECT p.purchase_id, member_id, address, order_name, total_price, product_id, quantity FROM purchase p LEFT OUTER JOIN purchase_product pp ON p.purchase_id = pp.purchase_id WHERE p.purchase_id = #{id} ORDER BY p.purchase_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase (purchase_id, member_id, address, order_name, total_price) VALUES (#{purchaseId}, #{memberId}, #{address}, #{orderName}, #{totalPrice})
